attributes.action: Make an extra bank holiday for the World Cup Final.
attributes.additional_details: So all of the nation can celebrate it together.
attributes.background: Create a national bank holiday on the day the world cup final is held.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The world cup final is taking place on a Sunday rather than a working day on which a bank holiday can be scheduled. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
